name: Tendre
description:
Inspired by the map of Tendre, a cartographic representation of love as an allegorical land, this location-based game takes the player to a mysterious island.

Install it on your GPS-enabled phone or tablet, and head out for the start of the adventure. It takes about one hour to complete.

Designed and developped by Mangatome.
Visuals by WastePrincess.
Music "Terraform" by Brokenkites.
SFXs from various lovely users at freesound.org:  full attribution in filenames
